column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////The pizza did in fact take nearly 45 minutes to make its way to our table.  By now
column2: the dining room had filled up quite a bit.  The pizza tasted good
column3: but the amount of time waiting
column4: really hyped up my expectations.  The expectations fell short once reality hit.  It was just an average tasting pizza once the high wore down.
